mapper.insert: insert into tb_ad (ad_id, title, url, pic, sort, valid, ontime, offtime, category_id, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, is_delete, status, bak1, bak2, bak3) values (#{adId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{offtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bak1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bak2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bak3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
